sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the island of Pyke serves as home to both House Greyjoy and House Botley, which holds Lordsport.
sections.TOP:
Pyke (island)07474dlqtprgj4z6lbm6vu5pc65j1elcmfqq1205872014-03-28T21:21:52ZGreater good3347453::''For the castle see [[Pyke (castle)]], for other uses see [[Pyke]]''
[[Image:Pyke Pin.png|thumb|right|200px|Map showing the location of Pyke off the coast of Westeros.]]

[[Image:Lordsport.png|thumb|right|200px|[[Lordsport]], Pyke's harbor town.]]

'''Pyke''' is one of the [[Iron Islands]], an archipelago located on [[Ironman's Bay]], on the western side of [[Westeros]]. The island is the site of the [[Pyke (castle)|castle]] of the same name, which serves as the seat of [[House Greyjoy]], the ruling house of the [[Iron Islands]], and the town of [[Lordsport]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/pyke/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Pyke entry]</ref>
